recipes.label: Shapes in the Water
recipes.startdescription: The Kite has found Companionship. Something is trailing in our ships wake.

recipes.label: Companionship
recipes.startdescription: Curious dolphins, playful seals, watchful sharks. Those creatures that call the waters home follow us for a while, and break up the monotomy of water and air.

recipes.label: Things From Below
recipes.startdescription: These creatures following us, they do not move in the way earthly things should. We watch, but we never catch more than a glance. They stay below the waterline, hide in the ship's wake, before sinking back to deeper places.
